title: File Upload Success with Valid MP3 File
description: Verify that a valid MP3 file under 25MB uploads successfully and displays correct metadata.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage upload section
Upload a valid MP3 file below 25MB via drag-and-drop
Check that file metadata (name, size, format) is displayed correctly
Confirm no validation error messages appear
Verify user can proceed to processing step

title: File Upload Success with Valid WAV File
description: Verify that a valid WAV file under 25MB uploads successfully and displays correct metadata.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage upload section
Upload a valid WAV file below 25MB via file browser
Check that file metadata (name, size, format) is displayed correctly
Confirm no validation error messages appear
Verify user can proceed to processing step

title: File Upload Reject With Unsupported Format
description: Verify upload is rejected with proper error when unsupported file format is used.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage upload section
Attempt to upload a file with unsupported format (e.g., .ogg)
Verify validation error message specifies unsupported file format
Check upload is blocked and no processing can be initiated

title: File Upload Reject With Oversized File
description: Verify upload is rejected with proper error when file size is greater than 25MB.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage upload section
Attempt to upload valid format file larger than 25MB
Verify validation error message specifies file size exceeds limit
Confirm upload is blocked and processing cannot start

title: Processing Dashboard Displays Real-Time Progress
description: Verify processing dashboard updates each stem status from Pending to Processing to Complete with progress bars and estimated times.

steps.description: Upload a valid audio file and initiate processing
Check dashboard shows all stems with status set to 'Pending'
Verify statuses update to 'Processing' sequentially or concurrently as applicable
Confirm progress bars advance smoothly and estimated time is updated
Check all stems reach 'Complete' status when processing finishes

title: Processing Failure and Retry on Dashboard
description: Validate error handling on processing failure and functionality of Try Again button.

steps.description: Simulate failure in processing one or more stems
Verify error message appears indicating processing failure
Click the 'Try Again' button
Confirm processing restarts and statuses return to 'Pending' or 'Processing'
Verify processing can complete successfully on retry

title: Results Page Displays Four Individual Stem Players
description: Validate that the results page presents four separate audio players, one for each stem (Vocals, Drums, Bass, Other) with all controls.

steps.description: Upload and process a valid audio file successfully
Navigate to results page after processing completion
Confirm presence of four stem audio players labeled Vocals, Drums, Bass, and Other
Verify each stem player has play/pause, volume slider, and waveform visualizer
Check all playback controls function correctly (play, pause, seek, volume adjustment)

title: Individual Stem Download Button Functionality
description: Verify that download buttons next to each stem audio player initiate correct file downloads.

steps.description: Process audio file and open results page
Click download button for each individual stem player
Confirm corresponding stem audio file download starts
Validate downloaded files are correctly named and playable

title: Download All Stems Button Functionality
description: Verify that 'Download All Stems' button triggers batch download of all separated stems.

steps.description: Process audio file and open results page
Click the 'Download All Stems' button
Confirm all separated stem files are downloaded as a batch or a single archive
Verify all files in the batch are named correctly and playable

title: Keyboard Navigation Works Across UI Controls
description: Validate keyboard navigation is supported and logical across file upload, processing dashboard, and results page controls.

steps.description: Use keyboard (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space) to navigate through upload component
Ensure focus states are visible and actionable elements can be activated by keyboard
Navigate keyboard focus through processing dashboard stem status and retry buttons
Verify status controls and retry function via keyboard
Navigate keyboard focus across results page stem players and download buttons
Confirm play/pause, volume, waveform controls, and download buttons are operable by keyboard

title: Screen Reader Announces ARIA Labels Correctly
description: Check accessibility by verifying that screen readers announce ARIA labels and status updates properly on all key UI components.

steps.description: Use a screen reader tool to navigate the file upload input
Verify screen reader announces file upload instructions and validation errors
Navigate to processing dashboard using screen reader
Confirm real-time status changes and progress are announced
Navigate stem player controls on results page
Check ARIA labels for play/pause buttons, sliders, and download buttons are read correctly

title: Responsive UI Layout on Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile
description: Validate that the Brutalist-themed UI adjusts correctly and remains usable on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop viewport
Verify layout uses grid and spacing consistent with design
Resize or access on tablet viewport (e.g., 768px width)
Confirm UI elements reflow for tablet with no overflow or distortion
Resize or access on mobile viewport (e.g., 375px width)
Verify all controls remain visible, accessible, and usable on mobile layout

title: API Endpoint Handles Invalid Input Gracefully
description: Verify backend API responds with proper error codes and messages on invalid upload or processing requests.

steps.description: Send API request to upload endpoint with unsupported file format or no file
Check API returns HTTP 400 status and descriptive error
Send request to processing API with malformed or missing parameters
Confirm API returns HTTP 400 or 422 with clear error message
Simulate server fault and send processing request
Check API returns HTTP 500 and error message

title: Backend Processes Audio with Streamed Progress and Proper Cleanup
description: Verify backend Python Demucs processing streams progress updates correctly and cleans up temporary files after processing.

steps.description: Upload valid audio and initiate processing
Check backend streams incremental progress updates to frontend
Verify that after completion temporary files are deleted from server storage
Ensure no leftover temporary files remain in backend after processing

title: Process Multiple Files Sequentially Without Issues
description: Verify user can upload and process multiple audio files in sequence without application crashes or data leak across sessions.

steps.description: Upload and process first valid audio file
Verify correct processing and results page display
Navigate back to upload page
Upload and process a second valid audio file
Confirm no residual data from first session is visible
Verify second file processes correctly and results page updates accordingly

title: Verify UI Color Contrast Meets Accessibility Standards
description: Test that all UI text and interface elements meet minimum WCAG contrast requirements for Brutalist theme colors.

steps.description: Use accessibility tools to scan contrast ratios for text and UI elements
Ensure all text and interactive elements meet WCAG AA minimum contrast ratio (4.5:1 for normal text)
Confirm no visual elements are too low contrast for readability

title: Waveform Visualizer Synchronizes with Audio Playback
description: Verify that the waveform visualizer updates in real-time and synchronizes correctly with audio playback for each stem.

steps.description: Play audio from any stem player on results page
Observe waveform visualizer animates in sync with audio playback progress
Pause and seek to different positions in playback
Check waveform updates accordingly, reflecting new playback position

title: Browser Compatibility Validation
description: Verify full functionality of core flows on latest Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers.

steps.description: Perform full happy path test of upload, processing, playback, and downloads on Chrome latest
Confirm all features function correctly
Repeat full happy path testing on Firefox latest
Confirm all features function correctly
Repeat full happy path testing on Safari latest
Confirm all features function correctly
Repeat full happy path testing on Edge latest
Confirm all features function correctly
